virality_potential.justification: Promotional content with community hashtags and emojis can generate moderate sharing within the Web3 community, but it's unlikely to go global.

informative_value.justification: Provides basic event details but not deep informational content.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant only until the tournament deadline; after that, it loses relevance.

virality_potential.justification: Job posting may get shared within the Ethereum community but unlikely to go viral globally.

informative_value.justification: Provides details about a job opportunity and contact instructions.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for the duration of the hiring process; after that, it becomes irrelevant.

virality_potential.justification: News about a new Layer 2 integration can generate interest within the Ethereum community and beyond, especially from PancakeSwap's large following.

informative_value.justification: Provides credible news about a new Layer 2 integration, relevant to Ethereum users.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Positive excitement about the upcoming integration.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for the period following the integration announcement; discussion may continue for weeks.

virality_potential.justification: Promotional content with crypto hashtags can generate moderate sharing within the crypto community but unlikely to go global.

informative_value.justification: Provides some technical details about Kaspa but not deep news.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for a few weeks as people discuss the coin; after that, it may fade.

virality_potential.justification: Large giveaway can attract shares within the community, but limited follower base reduces global reach.

informative_value.justification: Provides details about the giveaway but not deep informational content.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant only until the giveaway is completed; after that, it becomes irrelevant.
